name: 39th Annual Geriatric Care Conference
content: This CNE conference is designed to provide an overview of advancements in caring for geriatric patient populations focusing on mental health, palliative care, constipation management, hypertension, trauma informed care, and more. Expert panels and case scenarios for questions and answers are also included. This course offers Live (in-person) and Livestream (virtual) attendance options. Central Standard Time Zone URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/1763799-0?pid=4868 Time: 7:00 am - 5:00 pm Venue details: The Kahler Grand Hotel, 20 2nd Avenue Southwest, Rochester, Minnesota, 55902, United States Category: Conferences | Education Price: General Admission: USD 325.00
